trans-unit.source: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="BOFAction" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="BOFAction" /> 屬性相容的常數。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `BOFAction` property was used to determine what action the `ADODC` takes when the `BOF` property is true.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0`BOFAction`屬性用來判斷何種動作`ADODC`時採用`BOF`屬性為 true。

trans-unit.source: These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification.
trans-unit.target: 這些常數可啟用從 Visual Basic 6.0，才能繼續執行而不需額外修改已升級的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Keeps the first record as the current record.
trans-unit.target: 將第一筆資料錄保留為目前資料錄。

trans-unit.source: Moving past the start of a <see langword="Recordset" /> triggers the <see langword="Validate" /> event on the first record, followed by a Reposition event on the invalid (BOF) record.
trans-unit.target: 若移動超過 <see langword="Recordset" /> 的開頭，將會在第一筆資料錄上觸發 <see langword="Validate" /> 事件，接著會在無效的 (BOF) 資料錄上觸發 Reposition 事件。

trans-unit.source: At this point, the **Move Previous** button on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 這時，<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 上的 [移到上一個] 按鈕是停用的。
